Why, yes it would have, now you mention it.  That's another point in its
favour.  Thomas, I hope they let you script the remake.  I vote for the kids
getting him in his sleep.
	Gereg

   Date: Mon, 13 Dec 2004 16:27:36 +0000

Subject: Re: Last Samurai alternative scenarios - OT/trivia - apologies in
advance

Would have made for a very short movie!

Bob Burke

In a message dated 12/13/2004 8:54:18 AM Eastern Standard Time, "Thomas
Davidson" <tom.davidson@...> writes:

>
>
>If anyone's interested, how about some alternative scenes from
>The Last Samurai?
>
>My favourite would be TC captured and taken to the village, to the
>house of the man he has just killed.
>
>TC steps up, the door slams open and Koyuki sinks a short spear
>straight down his gullet. She is samurai after all, and this is the
>barbarian who just killed her husband.
>
>Alt.alternative is that the kids stab him to death in his sleep.
>
>Roll credits.
>
>Thomas
